N1 = 320 + 3 < 512 = 2^9
N2 = 224 + 3 < 256 = 2^8
N3 = 96 + 3 < 128 = 2^7
N4 = 96 + 3 < 128 = 2^7
N5 = 32 + 3 < 64 = 2^6
N12, N23, N34, N45, N51, N5w = 2+2=4

ADD THEM: 1112

Network IP: 144.240.240.0
Mask: 255.255.248.0 (/21) => 2^11 = 2048 so is correct

N1: 144.240.240.0-144.240.241.255   /23   255.255.254.0	
N2: 144.240.242.0-144.240.242.255   /24   255.255.255.0
N3: 144.240.243.0-144.240.243.127   /25
N4: 144.240.243.128-144.240.243.255 /25   .128	
N5: 144.240.244.0-144.240.244.63   /26   .192	
N12: 144.240.244.64-144.240.244.67  /30  .252
